name: Equilibrium Instant Plumping Eye Mask
about: What it is:This eye mask instantly hydrates and plumps skin while reducing the look of puffiness and undereye bags for a more refreshed, wide-awake appearance..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Puffiness.Highlighted Ingredients:-Amnio Youth Lipids: A powerful pro-lipid blend featuring vegan Phosphatidylglycerol, which mimics a key nutrient in amniotic fluid. The expertly formulated blend accelerates natural cell turnover and replenishes moisture with restoring lipids for skin that appears more radiant and youthful..Ingredient Callouts:Free of alcohol, gluten, mineral oil, parabens, phthalates, petrolatum/paraffin, sulfates, synthetic dye, and synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This gel formula is infused with two innovative Complexes to instantly rejuvenate the look of the undereye area. The Hourglass Plumping Complex smooths, visibly firms, and reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles, while HOURGLASS Amnio Youth Lipids help replenish moisture..Clinical Results:-96% said their skin is instantly softer, smoother, and instantly more hydrated. -93% said it gives a healthy-looking glow.- 86% said their skin looks instantly firmer, more awake, improving make-up application after use-83% said their undereye puffiness looks reduced-83% said their undereye puffiness looks reduced-83% said their undereye puffiness looks reduced- 80% said their eye bags look reduced-90% said their eye area looks rejuvenated.
ingredients: Glycerin, Water/Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Phenoxyethanol, Phospholipids, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Tocopherol, Lecithin. ..Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of Hourglass’s commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On clean, dry skin, gently apply a thin layer to undereye area using fingertips. Leave on for at least 15 minutes, then either gently tissue off without rinsing or massage excess into skin until fully absorbed..- Can be used alone or before makeup for an instant plumping effect and refreshing boost of hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 53 year old female with highly sensitive, eczema prone, allergy suffering skin. I absolutely love the essence, serum, both eye creams, and moisturizer. 5 stars for each one. Best line out there. I don't know why there isn't more buzz out there because this is the best. Skipped the cleanser as it is expensive, subpar ingredients (especially considering the quality ingredients in the rest of the line), and you wash it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not only for myself, but a must have for clients! I use this under the eye to catch fall out and hydrate at the same time. Concealer applies like a dream when I leave this on for 15 minutes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it’s so hydrating but definitely only for nighttime use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating and thick. Feels nice but cannot easily be layered in top of. Does not visibly plump by much or for very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Should have returned this but I wanted to keep trying to see of I can get it to work for me.   It just doesn't make sense. You can't use it before makeup because it doesnt absorb and you have to wipe it off and the residue is not ideal for makeup application. And I don't see any results.   Much better off using eye patch masks before makeup as you can let the serum absorb.   Im not trying to spend this much money just to wipe it off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for about 2 months or so (but not religiously). It does work nicely if you put it on before bed. It's not a life changer, but it works enough that I'm not mad I bought it. I should say I'm old so I need a little more heavy duty eye cream, but this was nice enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this product! I have very sensitive skin and have no issues. Love that it is “odorless” and doesn’t have an overpowering fragrance smell. Saw great results and can’t wait to keep using

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: does absolutely nothing. Please don’t waste your money on this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did nothing for me lol I returned it thank the lordT

reviews.review_title: Everybody needs this in their life!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an insane product for revitalizing sad tired eyes. Instant results. This is pure magic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite under eye product! I have sunken-in under eyes, and buying product this was my last attempt at improving the appearance before getting tear trough fillers. This is the best under eye products i’ve used! I use it about 2-3x a week, and leave a thin layer on overnighth. My eyes the next day look plump, moisturized & brighter. I alternate between other products as well, but this one made the biggest difference! I would most definitely recommend buying if you have dunken in eyes like me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! I saw a difference the first time I used it. With 3 kids and 2 jobs, this item is essential lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Two stars for moisture but this migrated to my eyes and burned. No matter how far down I applied or how little I used. Even after I wiped it off it still burned. I had to use eye drops and a cotton bud to clean out the inside of my lid.  Going back! And yes, I actually paid for this with my own money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried so many eye products to help with the puffiness under my eyes. This is the only product ever to make a difference! Feels great going on and although it doesn’t totally get rid of the bags under my eyes it reduces the appearance greatly. Very happy I tried this product and will continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hourglass gifted me the Equilibrium Instant Plumping Eye Mask to test, honest opinions are my own.  This lightweight gel type formula does indeed hydrate, plump up and smooths out my 41 year old under-eyes. At $68 for 30mL of product, yes the Equilibrium Instant Plumping Eye Mask is on the expensive side but a little goes a long ways and it also does double duty as an excellent under-eye primer. You will get MANY uses out of this tube since you only need to apply a super thin layer on cleansed skin.  I can use it as: before bed as Overnight Eye Mask in the morning as Eye Cream and a wonderful Under-eye Primer  I love how it helps depuff and wakes up my morning eyes. It also creates a great primer base for my no makeup makeup looks — color corrector, concealer and/or foundation stays put smoothly around my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m absolutely obsessed with this. I think the last time I felt this way about a product was a few years ago when I came across & fell for the laneige lip mask that I still use daily. This lovely mask can be worn truly all day…it softens & adds bounce to the fine lines!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Equlibrium Instant Plumping eye mask by Hourglass has been great for my under eyes. I've noticed they are more nourished, they don't look as tired, and do look more hydrated/plumped. I would apply the product as recommended and have seen improvement since the first day that I started using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this eye mask! My eyes are very sensitive and some eye creams can really irritate them but this does not at all! It is super hydrating and I love how I can wipe it off and it doesn’t feel super thick or sticky around my eyes. I love the way it makes my under eye skin feel. If you are looking for hydration under the eyes I definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very hydrating and rich without feeling heavy. It’s like a thick gel and feels amazing under the eyes. I apply it right before I start my makeup and by the time I get to concealer my undereyes are smooth and hydrated. My concealer wears better when I use this I don’t wipe it off and just tap in any excess. Pretty pricey but great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: hourglass recently sent me their latest addition to the equilibrium skincare collection: instant plumping eye mask. this powerful gel eye mask instantly hydrates & plumps skin  while reducing the look of puffiness & undereye bags for a more refreshed appearance. i am totally in love & have been using it since. i personally like to leave this product on, & use it as an eye cream, but it can be used as a 15 minute mask, eye cream, & even before makeup. ⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀  ⠀

reviews.review_title: Waiting to see its full potential
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Hourglass.  I was very curious about this new eye mask, so I put it to the test right away.  I like the packaging, it definitely makes the application easier. The formula is very smooth and hydrating. I apply this mostly and night and leave it on overnight. I like that I am waking up in the morning with a more hydrated under eye area. Overall I do enjoy this product, I haven't seen significant changes on my skin (I do have dark circles, puffiness sometimes and fine lines), maybe because I haven't been using this product for long. I am planning to use it for a longer period of time and see it at its full potential. Price point a bit high.

reviews.review_title: It’s ok, not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try and I like it but for $68 would I recommend or re purchase NO. It’s a thick gel like texture and I use a dot size amount on each eye and it does hydrate and plump the skin under the eye and it looks so shiny and glossy but do you need it, NO. I have been using it with or without makeup, when I apply it during the daytime before my sunscreen I love it because it’s not so shiny looking, at night I don’t mind it, under makeup I don’t really see a difference other than a hydrated under eye. I normally apply the product then a while later I dab it into my under eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this eye mask as the last step in my nighttime skincare routine this past week and I have been loving my results! My eyes look so refreshed and my dark circles are getting better. No more tired and dry eyes, they’re plump and happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eye mask is amazing! It helps to minimize morning puffiness in several minutes - no kidding! Just apply a proper layer and let it soak in. I also store the tube in the fridge to enhance the effect. Works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye mask was gifted by Hourglass for my review. To be honest, I feel like this doesn’t do very much for me, which is disappointing considering the price tag. It feels good upon application, gives some hydration, and I think that the overall eye area appears more plump after use, but I feel like it’s really subtle and there are products that are half the price that do more. I do appreciate the large size of the tube, so it will definitely lasts a while.  It’s just ok for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream mask from Hourglass is a miracle, I love it. I put it on every day, I don’t wash it off, there are no edema, there are no dark circles, it smoothes wrinkles, in general, I advise you, you won’t regret

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good hydrating eye product. It feels nourishing and makes the under eye area smooth and preps it well for foundation and concealer. However, I don’t feel it’s anything extra special as of right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this product and it is my first official best of beauty find of 2022. I apply a thin layer under my eyes and it really works to plump, hydrate and smooth my fine lines. It is a great prep product to ensure a smooth makeup application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really needed my under eye area to be treated and was excited to try this out because I love mostly all products from Hourglass. It works! Skin looks hydrated and plumed. Cooling effect is a big plus too! I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I am obsessed with this Plumping Eye Mask! I'm in my mid thirties and starting to deal with undereye issues, especially when applying makeup. This mask really brings my eyes to life! I look more awake, more refreshed, and my undereye area looks smooth and not puffy at all. It's so nice because I can use it as a mask before bedtime, or I can use it to prep my undereye area before a glam makeup look. I've tried a few Hourglass skincare products and all of them are top notch in quality and effectiveness. I also love how the tube makes it so easy to get the product out. Super simple and easy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been needing an under eye treatment because of the dark circles and puffiness I’ve been getting from lack of sleep due to work. This eye mask by Hourglass is the perfect remedy for me. It comes in an easy to use tube and is a nice gel texture. It feels soothing when I apply it and not super tacky! I usually leave it on overnight as I sleep so I wake up the next day looking more refreshed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me complimentary from Hourglass for review. I used this during my skin prep for apply my makeup to help reduce fine lines in my concealer. I liked the hydrating effect for my under eye, but did not see a reduction in fine lines overall. I would have to keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are many ways to use this plumping eye mask. You can use a little or a lot. I used it as an overnight treatment mask or a mini 15-minute treatment. I also used it when I felt like my under eyes needed hydration or under my makeup to give a softer look and to help reduce the appearance of fine lines. I enjoyed the many ways to help my eyes look softer and smoother. This gives great hydration which helped me to see a plumping effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is easy to use and causes no irritation on my sensitive skin. It’s easy to wash off as well. However, I did not see a huge change in the fine lines under my eyes. Maybe with prolonged use, I will see more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This definitely helps in the reduction of darkness under my eyes. I also felt a much smoother texture which helped result in my under eye appearing to have less wrinkles especially whenever I wear makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powerful eye mask instantly hydrates and plumps skin while reducing the look of puffiness and undereye bags for a more refreshed appearance. The gel formula is infused with two innovative complexes to instantly rejuvenate the look of the under eye area. The Hourglass PlumpingComplex smooths, visibly firms, and reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles, while the groundbreaking Cell Balancing Complex™helps strengthen the skin barrier. Can be used alone or before makeup for an instant plumping effect and refreshing boost of hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me complimentary from Hourglass for review. My main skincare concern is anti aging, especially around my eyes. After applying morning and night,I found this eye cream worked to firm my undereyes and helped the appearance to look smoother. I like the pointy applicator which distributed the right amount of product without cross-contamination.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dark circles under my eyes and now that I have a newborn, they’re often a little saggy too. I had really high hopes for this product so I hate to say, I was not impressed. This felt sticky on my skin and never felt absorbed. Afterwards I didn’t feel a huge difference either. I would love to love this product but I don’t think it’s for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye plumping mask! It helps to reduce my dark circle and eye puffiness in the morning and I can see a noticeable difference within minutes after applying it! It’s moisturizing and not too thick, which I always look for in eye cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me begin by saying that I’m absolutely in love with this brand in general and was really excited to try this eye mask out. I’ve used 4 times, 2 times a week right before bed. I left it on for 20 minutes and oh my I do see a difference. My under eye area looks so much better, super hydrated and wrinkles seem to be vanishing off slowly but surely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hope this eye mask gets rid of my eye bags. It also will hydrates and plumps skin while reducing the look of puffiness, smooths, visibly firms, and reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles. I was gifted by Hourglass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hourglass gifted me their Instant Eye Mask. I love the way this feels on the skin. It's sinks in quickly with zero irritation to my under eye. I did not see much plumping initially but I'm sure after prolonged use there will be results. It was very hydrating on my under eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great eye mask! It has a really nice texture & it’s very hydrating. I put it on at night and can still feel it on in the morning. It does a nice job of plumping up the under eye & moisturizing before makeup. Highly recommend trying it out especially if you have dry under eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a great item from Hourglass Cosmetics. The packaging is super cute and the smell is great too. A nice addition to my routine! I would highly recommend this product to my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried this, I applied it to only one under eye so I could really see the difference between the two. I will say that because this is called a plumping eye mask, I was expecting it to have more of a plumping effect. With that being said, I was able to notice a brighter under eye when I used this product. It just helps you to look a little more awake. I will say that this product makes your morning skincare routine significantly longer because you need an extra 15 minutes for this eye mask. If you have the time to spare, this may work for you. I did see some results, but it wasn’t drastic. Out of convenience, I still might reach for my eye patches over these. This is quite a pricey product, but you do get quite a generous amount of product for what you’re paying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really impressed with this eye mask. I love this gel consistency, it leaves my under eyes area so smooth and hydrated. It’s been a week I have been using this eye cream in the morning before I head to work. I would just let it soak into the skin for 10 mins before I apply other products.  I find that it's instantly helping me with dark circles, and depuff my undereyes.

reviews.review_title: Wow! Hydration and Smooth Skin Under Your Eyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This intense eye mask is impressive. It’s the real deal if you want to really hydrate your eye area. It reduces under eye bags while simultaneously reducing puffiness. This formulation glides on light as air, and it feels so good!  Your skin barrier is firmed up, and the overall look of the delicate skin around your eyes is so much firmer. With consistent use, this product is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this eye mask because I have fine lines around my 47 year old eyes. It just didn’t live up to the hype. It moisturized my eyes well but that’s about all it did. I saw minimal plumping and no fading to the discoloration around my eyes.  I would only recommend this as a night moisturizer for the eyes and don’t expect spectacular results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a a creamy velvet texture. Unlike any eye cream I’ve ever used! It layers nicely with no pilling. I’ve worn it by leaving it on instead of a mask and I’ve even layered it over thinner eye “creams” and it feels like it seals everything in nicely. It also have a filling effect to it. Pairs lovely under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first glance, I love the sleek packaging and generous size, looks great on my vanity. The consistency of this formula is very thick but still absorbs nicely after waiting the recommended time and gently patting it in. I didn’t notice a significant difference to my undereyes but they were definitely less puffy and a little brighter. I look forward to continuing observing improvements to the overall appearance of my undereyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have only been using this for about 5 days so far and can already tell a HUGE difference in the hooding in my eyes! I am SHOCKED! VERY FIRMING!!!! Good moisturizer too, no extra moisturizer needed with it. I am sure the longer I use it the more it will work on the fine lines. I am just blown away by the firming!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved using this product before makeup application, it really smoothed my under eye area and allowed for makeup to go on beautifully! I’ll definitely be reaching for this as a makeup prep step or a thicker layer when masking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this Instant Plumping Eye Mask in the morning before I put on makeup. You have to leave it on  for 15 minutes and then I either carefully wipe off excess or massage it into my eye area well. It's working great! I can see a difference in my fine line and wrinkles and it feels hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This instant plumping eye mask is the bee’s knees! It has done wonders for my dry under eyes. I started noticing a difference in hydration after only one week. I prefer to apply it at the end of the day after I fully cleanse my face, but it also wears great under any concealer. Such a game changer, 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the equilibrium line from Hourglass bc if it’s filter like benefits. This eye mask did not disappoint. I love the thick gel formula as it instantly hydrates and plumps my under eye area. I use it right after my NuFACE toning device and I swear my under eyes look so invigorated and refreshed. The formulation is amazing for my dry under eyes, it is looking softer, smoother, and more alive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great eye mask that really plumpens and livens my under eye area. Not to mention it goes on so nicely and really leaves the area pretty hydrated and more youthful looking. This is also really helpful to the wrinkles under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: [Gifted by Hourglass] An instant plumping eye mask sounded so intriguing to me so I'm thankful to have gotten the chance to try this. It's very pleasant to use and didn't cause any irritation or sensitivities to the eye area. However, not sure if it's because I don't have a ton of under eye problems or what but I didn't notice too much change from using it. I'm hoping that it'll be more noticeable with more consistent use but it's definitely not a must have for me. Regardless, I am enjoying it and will definitely continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have to be very careful with my sensitive skin, but as well i have huge dark under eyes area and luck of radiance in this area. i decided to try this mask to see if Hourglass quality ingredients will help me to reduce this problem. and its definitely works. skin more firm and heathy. i will definitely update you after 1 month of use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye mask instantly hydrates and plumps skin while reducing the look of puffiness and undereye bags for a more refreshed appearance. The gel formula rejuvenates the look of the under eye area. The Hourglass PlumpingComplex smooths, visibly firms, and reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles. I’ve thought to use filler under eyes but no more needed with Hourglass mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I love the packaging! Very elegant. The applicator makes it easy to use as well. I thought the formula was quite nice and could feel it working. My favorite way to use was in conjunction with a hydrating mask in the shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry under eyes that are made worse by the fact that I wear contacts and my eyes are always watering. I like to use this in my skincare routine at night, I find that it helps my eyes feel more plump and awake in the morning when I’m doing my makeup. A little goes a long way with this product so you don’t need to overuse it and waste the product because it is expensive! This is definitely one of those products that you don’t necessarily need in your routine but once you get it and start using it you probably won’t be able to live without. I’ve really noticed a difference in how much less my under eyes are irritated and red since using this eye mask. I dont ever take it off after 15 minutes I just work the excess into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have product! I apply this while I’m getting ready and leave on for around 15 minutes. It does wonders for the eye area. It depuffs and hydrates your eye area so you look instantly refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Hourglass their new Equilibrium instant plumping eye mask and let me tell you it is beyond amazing! This little eye mask is my new best friend! Just a little bit in the morning and my eyes look bright and wake all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed!! I am 36 and I have very dry under eyes. I have to be really careful about which under eye products I use because it worse. This product is super hydrating and I can say it was really fast acting! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this unique product complimentary from hourglass cosmetics. It really helps depuff my undereyes and makes it look plump and dewy. It’s cooling sensation is very calming and soothing for tired eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels really nice - refreshing and smoothing when applied under the eye. I am always a bit bummed when skincare products for around the eye area aren’t also intended for eyelid use, so that’s a downside for me with this product. But primarily, I don’t notice a visual difference between when I do and don’t use this product. So while it feels nice, I don’t see any visual benefits from using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye mask because I saw results. My eyes look more awake. It reduced the puffiness, hydrated my eyes, and plumped my skin. It absorbed quickly and it did not irritate my eyes. This product was gifted by Hourglass Cosmetics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My current mommy must have because of my interrupted sleep I have puffy eyes and dark circles. This has been great for the puffiness and makes it easier to do my makeup, usually the puffiness makes my concealer crease. Anyways! This feels amazing, super hydrating and I am obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by hourless cosmetics. I was a little skeptical about this but this product is amazing!! I have dry sensitive skin and this product does not irritate my skin at all. The product just sinks into my skin and it makes my under eyes look bright and radiant. I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye mask is extremely hydrating. It makes the under eye area very soft and supple. It’s not very heavy and I did not face any irritation issues. Also skin around my eyes is milia prone but this cream didn’t cause any such issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: complimentary from hourglass cosmetics. my eyes are always the biggest giveaway if i’m behind on sleep or have been having a bit too much sodium. i like how plumping and moisturizing this eye cream is. i keep it in the fridge and roll it on with my mini roller to massage the area. it doesn’t get cakey under concealer either, which is a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become my favorite and I love how wonderful it feels in my eye area! I just wish it wasn’t as pricey! I really enjoy it and a little goes a long way! This is my first Hourglass skincare product and is fantastic! Can’t wait to try more!

My eyes felt much better and moisturized. I usually just apply eye cream for my little wrinkles around my eyes, but this works so much better and stays feeling moist so much more than with the cream. This is my new routine before bedtime and I love it! Great to relax and decompres

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to be say I was gifted this product by EQUILIBRIUM. I bought original eye balm wasn’t crazy about packaging but loved the product. This truly is a great product but not sure if I will repurchase. May that like things better though I may repurchase just have see when I finish i

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s my first time trying an eye mask and I must say I love it a lot more that eye patches! I don’t have wrinkles yet, but I struggle with puffiness and dark circles (dark circles are genetics and they never go away), but the puffiness was gone in less than 10 minutes! Mask is very easy to apply and leaves the skin under eyes smooth and moisturized.  It’s a bit pricey, but works well and the tube will last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this new eye cream with Hourglass and didn't realize they had any skincare. This has no scent which I do love and it also is a gel texture. I do find this hydrates my undereyes very well! I didn't notice any difference in lowering my puffiness. If you are looking for a great hydrating eye gel especially for winter, this is the one to get! It did also help keep my fine lines and wrinkles at bay!   It does not instantly hydrate or reduce puffiness as it says but it does hydrate well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great for use during the winter time. Very soothing and hydrating. My eyes definitely look plump and makes me look more awake. It is very pricey but a little goes a long way for me. Looking forward to trying more from the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m super excited about this eye mask! My under eye area looks amazing, hydrated and smooth! Love the texture so much, feels kind of thick but it absorbs fast and my concealer looks great and doesn’t crease! I really enjoy it! Completely from Hourglass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll be honest-when I first saw this product I thought it was gimmicky/too good to be true. I couldn’t have been more wrong! Let me tell you-I AM OBSESSED!! I notice a huge difference to the plumpness of my under eye area. I am oily and I was worried it my makeup would melt off as a result but I’m happy to report it lasted though a 12 hr work shift flawlessly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been loving the Equilibrium Plumping Eye Mask. My eyes are always looking so tired and having an eye mask really helps rejuvenate the area and makes me look more awake. gifted by Hourglass Cosmetics

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The last two eye masks I’ve used dried out my eyes severely so this comes at a much needed time! Super hydrating, reduced the puffiness of my eye area, and visibly refreshing. Loved this one and will be recommending it to my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is awesome for instant plumping and smoothing around the eyes! I also use it on my nasolabial folds it works great there as well. For me, the effects last about 6-8 hours before it kind of goes back to normal. The instrcutions say you can massage excess into the skin, but it sometimes pills under makeup. Overall, this is nice to have for special occasions, but it’s a bit expensive to use everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eye mask is wonderful to use during winter time. The texture is very emollient and moisturizing. The ingredients are not too complicated to cause any irritations. The sunflower seed oil will rapidly plump and smooth the appearance of lines under eyes.  I hope more antioxidants are added for anti-aging benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a little over a week and wow it gives me under eyes the hydration it craves. My under eyes have been so dry lately, but this product as been working wonders on it. I feel like I look more awake when I use this product, which I love. I can’t wait to keep using this product.

reviews.review_title: Silky smooth and awake eye area!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had my doubts, but I was pleased to be proved wrong. This eye mask is so light, silky, creamy, smoothing and soothing. It feels amazing and it’s especially great for winter. No irritation, no swelling or burning or sensitivity. Just hydrating, firming goodness! It feels like it would contain silicone due to the slip texture, but it doesn’t. I also like that it isn’t heavy, but it’s still super softening! I have a variety of eye area products, but this is unique enough to hold its own place. It actually reminds me a little bit of a very high-end luxury French brand eye mask, except this one is much more affordable in comparison. I have used this as an eye cream and I have also used it overnight. I’ve massaged it in and it works all of those ways. I love how quickly my area feels smooth and hydrated. I’m not sure I would say “plump,” but very smooth and wrinkles and fine lines look way less visible. Highly recommend this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Hourglass Equilibrium Instant Plumping Eye Mask and I really liked it. I have now added it to my skincare routine. I follow the instructions on the packaging and wake up with hydrated skin under my eyes, whenever I use it at night. I have also tried it under makeup and love the results. I have combination skin but my undereye area is dry. And this winter the Hourglass eye mask is helping me keep my under eye area hydrated. This product is Vegan and has a slight plumping effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received complimentary from Hourglass for my honest review.  First time trying this brand and I am SOLD! This eye mask not only smooths  but depuffs and energizes my eyes.   A game changer, Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Hourglass and I absolutely love it. I run an Instagram account so I was able to try this, however I am also currently going through IVF which is a very emotional process and this has actually helped make my undereyes look better. You do need to rinse this off, it’s too thick to use as simply an eye cream, it’s definitely a mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from veryyy dry undereyes but veryyy oily eyelids. What I love about this eye mask is that it’s essentially a shot of hydration for my undereyes. I find my concealer creases a lot less when my undereyes are adequately hydrated, so this is a winner for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first skincare item I have tried by hourglass and I am honestly impressed. I love the texture of this and love the hydrating effects. I do wish it Had a metal applicator tip for the cream so I don’t have to use my hands. Gifted by hourglass cosmetics

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eye mask is great to use before applying my makeup, it helps smooth and revive my undereyes,  it's such a treat to use!  I notice I look more awake and my eyes appear more youthful.  Overall I'm really impressed,  I've never tried anything like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t expecting to like this stuff as much as I do! I did a side by side comparison so I could really get the feel on of the product worked or not and I’m pleased to say I saw a reduction in puffiness and it even brightened the under eye!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m actually shocked with how much I like this. The gel formula feels really refreshing under the eyes. A lot of it gets absorbed but I end up washing off the rest as personal preference. The skin under my eyes is so baby soft and hydrated afterwards. I was actually really shocked the first time I tried it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Equilibrium Instant Plumping Eye Mask complimentary from Hourglass Cosmetics. This is my first time using an eye mask and I found it to be really effective at plumping up the skin around my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by hourglass. This is a great product that can be worn with or without makeup. I find that the consistency is thin but a little goes a long way. I use this mainly as a primer under my eyes before concealer. I find that it adds a nice amount of hydration but nothing greasy. It doesn’t interact with my concealer either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing mask for your eyes that I received complimentary from Hourglass. Let me start with how cute the package is, it looks expensive and can be a great gift to someone who cares about their skincare routine. I loved the mask as well, so easy to apply. You don’t need much for it to work. It has very strong depuffing effect.
